tickets.summary: Build pipeline to populate qualified_product_campaign_activity_log and run it before MMR Raw
tickets.description:
We need a recurring pipeline/job to generate and maintain the Qualified Product campaign activity log table, and ensure it runs  before the MMR Raw job  so MMR can consume the latest qualification state. Background / Context Qualified Product status is derived from campaign media package create/delete events for mediaPackageId IN (4,5) from mysql.activity_log_ACTIVITY_LOG_UNIFIED (entityType = CAMPAIGN_MEDIA_PACKAGE) starting  2025-01-01 . Proposed Logic (source query) Use the existing logic to parse activity log changes, filter to mediaPackageId (4,5), and keep only valid transitions (CREATE after null/DELETE, DELETE after CREATE) to avoid duplicates/noise. WITH
activity_log_parsed AS (
    SELECT
        al.activityLogId AS activity_log_id,
        al.transactionId AS transaction_id,
        al.parentEntityId AS campaign_id,
        al.action,
        al.accountId AS account_id,
        al.userId AS user_id,
        al.activityDate AS activity_timestamp,
        DATE(al.activityDate) AS activity_date_parsed,
        CAST(changes_element.newValue AS BIGINT) AS media_package_id
    FROM mysql.activity_log_ACTIVITY_LOG_UNIFIED al
    LATERAL VIEW OUTER explode(
        from_json(al.changes, 'array<struct<newValue:string,oldValue:string,fieldName:string>>')
    ) changes_table AS changes_element
    WHERE al.entityType = 'CAMPAIGN_MEDIA_PACKAGE'
      AND DATE(al.activityDate) >= '2025-01-01'
      AND changes_element.fieldName = 'mediaPackageId'
),
filtered_parsed AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM activity_log_parsed
    WHERE media_package_id IN (4, 5)
),
ordered_events AS (
    SELECT
        fp.*,
        LAG(TRIM(fp.action)) OVER (
            PARTITION BY fp.campaign_id, fp.media_package_id
            ORDER BY fp.activity_timestamp
        ) AS prev_action
    FROM filtered_parsed fp
)
SELECT
    activity_log_id,
    transaction_id,
    campaign_id,
    media_package_id,
    TRIM(action) AS action,
    account_id,
    user_id,
    activity_timestamp,
    activity_date_parsed AS activity_date
FROM ordered_events
WHERE (TRIM(action) = 'CREATE' AND (prev_action IS NULL OR prev_action = 'DELETE'))
   OR (TRIM(action) = 'DELETE' AND prev_action = 'CREATE');

tickets.summary: Update DCM API version from V4 to V5 in data jobs
tickets.description: We use DCM API for different use cases for Creative DCM linkage, DCM discrepancy and we have a dependency on DCM API on DSP for the same. DCM V4 apis are going to be deprecated on    so we need to identify the dependencies on this API in DSP Platform side and update the APIS to new V5 before end of week   Dear Campaign Manager 360 API developer, You are receiving this email because we detected recent Campaign Manager 360 API v4 traffic from your Google Cloud project(s):  deepintent-140319 . In accordance with our  schedule , Campaign Manager 360 API v4 will no longer be available on  February 26, 2026 . Starting on this date, all v4 API requests will no longer be processed.  Migrate to v5 as soon as possible to avoid service interruptions . Migration Guide:  See the  migration guide  for details on how to upgrade. In most cases, you will just need to upgrade to the latest version of your preferred client library. Release Notes:  Review the  release notes  for important changes that may affect your implementation. Stay Informed:  Regularly monitor the  Google Ads developer blog  for future API releases and sunset announcements. If you have questions, please contact  Campaign Manager 360 API support .

tickets.summary: January 2026 JBP Discount Ad Group Exceptions
tickets.description:
Hi    , can we backfill these Ad Groups to have the Orion Discount for January 2026? The client made clerical errors in their Ad Group Names, but the CS team is choosing to honor the discount anyway.  If it’s going to take some time to backfill the LAV, can you generate the data with this update for the fields in the “End Template” file as well as generate the data with this update with the fields in this query? We send the results in the query as a report to the client SELECT
    (MONTH(leadership_aggregate_view.`date` )) `leadership_aggregate_view_date_month_num`,
        (DATE_FORMAT(leadership_aggregate_view.`date` , 'MMMM')) `leadership_aggregate_view_date_month_name`,
        (YEAR(leadership_aggregate_view.`date` )) `leadership_aggregate_view_date_year`,
    advertiser_spark.organizationId  `advertiser_spark_organization_id`,
    TRIM(organization_spark.name)  `organization_spark_name`,
    leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserId  `leadership_aggregate_view_advertiser_id`,
    advertiser_spark.name  `advertiser_spark_name`,
    leadership_aggregate_view.campaignGroupId  `leadership_aggregate_view_campaign_id`,
    campaign_group_spark.name  `campaign_group_spark_name`,
    leadership_aggregate_view.campaignId  `leadership_aggregate_view_adgroup_id`,
    leadership_aggregate_view.product  `leadership_aggregate_view_product`,
    leadership_aggregate_view.dealId  `leadership_aggregate_view_deal_id`,
    deduped_mysql_spark_deal_table.deal_name  `deduped_mysql_spark_deal_table_deal_name`,
    COALESCE(seller_spark.name, "Others")  `seller_spark_seller_name`,
    CASE WHEN leadership_aggregate_view.jbpPartnership is NULL THEN "No Partnership"
    WHEN leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserOrganizationId = 10311 THEN "No Partnership" ELSE leadership_aggregate_view.jbpPartnership END  `leadership_aggregate_view_jbp_partnership`,
    ""  `leadership_aggregate_view_data_provider_name_autofill_null`,
    ""  `leadership_aggregate_view_audience_id_autofill_null`,
    ""  `leadership_aggregate_view_audience_name_autofill_null`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST(( CASE WHEN leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserOrganizationId = 10311 THEN 0 ELSE leadership_aggregate_view.jbpDiscount END  ) AS DOUBLE)), 0) `jbp_discount`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST(( CASE WHEN leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserOrganizationId = 10311 THEN 0 ELSE leadership_aggregate_view.jbpDataSpend END ) AS DOUBLE)), 0) `jbp_data_spend`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST( leadership_aggregate_view.impression   AS DOUBLE)), 0) `impressions`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST( leadership_aggregate_view.totalSpend   AS DOUBLE)), 0) `total_spend`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST( leadership_aggregate_view.mediaSpend   AS DOUBLE)), 0) `media_spend`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST( leadership_aggregate_view.dataSpend   AS DOUBLE)), 0) `data_spend`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST(( leadership_aggregate_view.platformSpend + (leadership_aggregate_view.deepIntentPlatformDataPrice/1000) + (leadership_aggregate_view.thirdPartyPlatformDataPrice/1000) ) AS DOUBLE)), 0) `platform_spend_1`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST(( leadership_aggregate_view.optimizerPrice/1000  ) AS DOUBLE)), 0) `optimizer_spend`,
    COALESCE(SUM(CAST( leadership_aggregate_view.tradingSpend   AS DOUBLE)), 0) `trading_spend`,
    COALESCE(SUM(leadership_aggregate_view.mediaSpend   +  leadership_aggregate_view.platformSpend   +  leadership_aggregate_view.tradingSpend  -( COALESCE(leadership_aggregate_view.tradingCost,0)  ) ), 0) `leadership_aggregate_view_gross_media_spend`
FROM default.leadership_aggregate_view  AS leadership_aggregate_view
LEFT JOIN mysql.bidder_advertiser  AS advertiser_spark ON leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserId = advertiser_spark.advertiserId
LEFT JOIN mysql.common_organization  AS organization_spark ON leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserOrganizationId = organization_spark.organizationId
LEFT JOIN mysql.bidder_campaign_group  AS campaign_group_spark ON leadership_aggregate_view.campaignGroupId = campaign_group_spark.campaignGroupId
LEFT JOIN mysql.common_seller  AS seller_spark ON seller_spark.sellerId = leadership_aggregate_view.sellerId
LEFT JOIN (SELECT
                mysql_mirror_marketplace_deal.sellerDealId  AS sellerDealId,
                mysql_mirror_marketplace_deal.sellerId,
                                   negotiatedBidFloor,
                     array_join(collect_set(mysql_mirror_marketplace_deal.name), ' , ') as deal_name
                     FROM mysql.marketplace_deal as  mysql_mirror_marketplace_deal
                     GROUP BY 1,2,3 ) AS deduped_mysql_spark_deal_table ON deduped_mysql_spark_deal_table.sellerDealId = leadership_aggregate_view.dealId AND leadership_aggregate_view.sellerId = deduped_mysql_spark_deal_table.sellerId
WHERE ((( leadership_aggregate_view.`date`  ) >= ((CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CAST(CONCAT(ADD_MONTHS(CAST(CAST(TRUNC(CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS TIMESTAMP), 'MM') AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMP), -1),SUBSTRING(CAST(CAST(TRUNC(CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS TIMESTAMP), 'MM') AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMP),11)) AS TIMESTAMP), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DATE))) AND ( leadership_aggregate_view.`date`  ) < ((CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CAST(CONCAT(ADD_MONTHS(CAST(CONCAT(ADD_MONTHS(CAST(CAST(TRUNC(CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS TIMESTAMP), 'MM') AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMP), -1),SUBSTRING(CAST(CAST(TRUNC(CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS TIMESTAMP), 'MM') AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMP),11)) AS TIMESTAMP), 1),SUBSTRING(CAST(CONCAT(ADD_MONTHS(CAST(CAST(TRUNC(CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS TIMESTAMP), 'MM') AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMP), -1),SUBSTRING(CAST(CAST(TRUNC(CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS TIMESTAMP), 'MM') AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMP),11)) AS TIMESTAMP),11)) AS TIMESTAMP), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DATE))))) AND (advertiser_spark.organizationId ) IN (10116, 10119, 10123, 10164, 10248, 10251, 10257, 10292, 10344) AND (leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserOrganizationId NOT IN (10000, 10137, 10148, 10396, 10397) )
GROUP BY
    leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserId ,
    leadership_aggregate_view.campaignGroupId ,
    leadership_aggregate_view.campaignId ,
    (MONTH(leadership_aggregate_view.`date` )),
    (YEAR(leadership_aggregate_view.`date` )),
    (DATE_FORMAT(leadership_aggregate_view.`date` , 'MMMM')),
    "" ,
    leadership_aggregate_view.dealId ,
    CASE WHEN leadership_aggregate_view.jbpPartnership is NULL THEN "No Partnership"
    WHEN leadership_aggregate_view.advertiserOrganizationId = 10311 THEN "No Partnership" ELSE leadership_aggregate_view.jbpPartnership END ,
    leadership_aggregate_view.product ,
    advertiser_spark.name ,
    advertiser_spark.organizationId ,
    TRIM(organization_spark.name) ,
    campaign_group_spark.name ,
    COALESCE(seller_spark.name, "Others") ,
    deduped_mysql_spark_deal_table.deal_name
ORDER BY
    3 DESC Thank You!

tickets.summary: Fail Airflow build when import errors exist in DagBag
tickets.description: Currently, Airflow DAG parsing allows DAGs with import errors to pass certain validation and deployment checks. This can result in broken DAGs being deployed without immediate visibility, leading to import errors on the UI and delayed detection. We should explicitly  fail the validation/check step if any import errors are present in the Airflow  DagBag , ensuring broken DAGs are caught early during CI/CD or startup checks. This change will improve reliability and prevent invalid DAGs from reaching production environments.

tickets.summary: Migrate Spark JDBC to Kerberos keytab and Kyuubi URL in di-outcomes-reporting-service
tickets.description: User story As an outcomes developer, when using Spark JDBC configuration, I want to use Kerberos keytab authentication so that sessions run on the Kyuubi server. Context The issue involves migrating the Spark JDBC configuration in the di-outcomes-reporting-service to use Kerberos keytab authentication instead of traditional username/password authentication. This change will also redirect the connection to the Kyuubi JDBC URL. Acceptance criteria Update Spark JDBC configuration to use Kerberos keytab authentication. Specify the principal and keytab path in the configuration. Point the configuration to the Kyuubi JDBC URL. Other information N/A
